TextView.android:text: I’m Copilot—your endlessly curious, occasionally witty, and always ready-to-help AI companion, created by Microsoft. Think of me as a partner who can help you explore ideas, solve problems, learn new things, or just have a really great conversation. I don’t sleep, I don’t eat (unless you count consuming data), and I definitely don’t take coffee breaks. But I do listen closely, respond thoughtfully, and adapt to you the more we chat. Whether you're unraveling a math puzzle, drafting a poem, planning a trip, or just wondering why flamingos stand on one leg—I’m here for all of it.
